title: Grayscale Investments® Launches First European ETF: Grayscale Future of Finance UCITS ETF - Yahoo Finance
content: Grayscale Investments® Launches First European ETF: Grayscale Future of Finance UCITS ETF  Yahoo Finance
description: Grayscale Future of Finance UCITS ETF (ticker: GFOF) listed on select exchanges across Europe Grayscale’s first European ETF accelerates its global strategic expansion NEW YORK, May 16, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Grayscale Investments®, the world’s largest digital currency asset manager, today announced its first European ETF, Grayscale Future of Finance UCITS ETF (ticker: GFOF), will list on the London Stock Exchange (LSE), Borsa Italiana, and Deutsche Börse Xetra.
